name: GetZoomMeetingPollInfo
description:
Retrieve details of a specific Zoom meeting poll.

Use this tool to get information about a specific poll in a Zoom meeting. This requires the meeting host to have a Pro or higher plan and to have enabled the Meeting Polls/Quizzes setting. Appropriate scopes are required for access.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Zoom meeting. Ensure it is stored as a long integer as it can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a `long` format integer, not a simple integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

parameters.name: poll_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the poll within a Zoom meeting. Required to retrieve poll details.
